item.title: 欧洲最大养老基金出售 100 亿欧元化石燃料资产
item.description: 欧洲最大的养老基金 Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP 退出了所有石油、天然气和煤炭领域的流动资产，价值约 100 亿欧元（108 亿美元），以实现绿色环保。【原文：Europe’s biggest pension fund, Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP, has exited all liquid assets in oil, gas and coal worth about €10 billion ($10.8 billion), in an effort to be greener.】

item.title: 波兰银行在遭遇 150 亿美元打击后着眼于增加诉讼交易的甜头
item.description: 波兰银行正计划提高向外币抵押贷款者提供的结算方式的吸引力，以缩短法律诉讼的时间，因为这一事件已经引发了价值 600 亿兹罗提（约合 154 亿美元）的法律纠纷。【原文：Polish banks are planning to boost the attractiveness of settlements offered to foreign-currency mortgage takers to shorten legal battles after the saga has fueled legal provisions worth 60 billion zloty ($15.4 billion).】

item.title: 亿万富翁领导的 QXO 聘用巴克莱银行家伊赫桑-埃赛义德（Ihsan Essaid）担任首任财务总监
item.description: 卡车运输业亿万富翁布拉德-雅各布斯（Brad Jacobs）的新公司 QXO Inc.【原文：QXO Inc., the new company of trucking billionaire Brad Jacobs, hired a Wall Street banker to run its finances as it gets closer to becoming a publicly-traded business.】

item.title: 投资者踊跃参与沙特首次公开募股，订单总额达 1,760 亿美元
item.description: 四家沙特阿拉伯公司的首次公开募股共吸引了 6,590 亿里亚尔（1,760 亿美元）的订单，因为基金经理们蜂拥而至，在过去两年里，这些公司的股票销售提供了近乎保证的回报。【原文：Four Saudi Arabian companies have drawn a combined 659 billion riyals ($176 billion) in orders for their initial public offerings, as fund managers flocked to share sales that have offered near-guaranteed returns over the last two years.】

item.title: 奈拉坚挺，央行在流动性担忧下抛售美元
item.description: 由于尼日利亚央行进入外汇市场抛售美元，奈拉汇率接近一个多月来的最强水平。【原文：The naira traded near its strongest level in over a month as Nigeria’s central bank stepped into the foreign exchange market to sell dollars.】

item.title: 关键选举前南非债券拍卖需求激增
item.description: 周二，在可能对市场起关键作用的大选前一天，投资者对南非每周一次的政府债券销售的需求激增。【原文：Investor demand surged at South Africa’s weekly government bond sale on Tuesday, a day ahead of a general election that could be pivotal for markets.】

item.title: 需求信号疲软，北海油轮上的石油漂浮不定
item.description: 三艘装载北海四十年代原油的油轮在欧洲海岸漂浮了两个多星期，一直没有卸货，这是欧洲和亚洲炼油厂需求减弱的一个迹象。【原文：Three tankers carrying North Sea Forties crude have been floating off European shores for more than two weeks without discharge, a sign of weakening demand from refineries in Europe and Asia.】

item.description:

The Eraring power plant had been due to close as soon as August next year. Now it will keep working until at least 2027.

item.title: 铝制造商诺维力斯寻求最高达 9.45 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据周二提交的一份文件显示，铝生产商诺维利斯公司（Novelis Inc.【原文：Aluminum producer Novelis Inc. is seeking to raise up to $945 million in an initial public offering, according to a filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 习近平承诺将青年就业作为重中之重
item.description: 据官方新华社报道，中国国家主席习近平在周一的政治局学习会议上承诺，将优先考虑青年就业问题，并将更多资源用于创造就业机会。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping pledged to prioritize youth employment and direct more resources to job creation at a Politburo study session on Monday, according to the official Xinhua News Agency.】

item.title: 华融集团第二位前高管因受贿罪被判处死刑
item.description: 中国以受贿罪判处中国华融国际控股有限公司（China Huarong International Holdings Ltd.）一名前官员死刑，不得缓期执行。【原文：China has sentenced an ex-official with China Huarong International Holdings Ltd. to death with no reprieve on bribery charge, making a rare death sentence for a second time in years on a senior financial executive as the authorities step up crackdown on financial crimes.】

item.title: ECP 将以每股 22 美元现金收购 Atlantica Sustainable
item.description: Energy Capital Partners 与联合投资方同意以每股 22 美元的现金收购 Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure Plc 公司，从而获得美国、欧洲、南美和非洲的可再生能源电力资产组合。【原文：Energy Capital Partners and co-investors agreed to acquire Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure Plc for $22 per share in cash, gaining a portfolio of renewable power assets across the US, Europe, South America and Africa.】

item.title: 非洲顶级服装零售商 Pepkor 将加强在巴西的扩张
item.description: 非洲最大的服装零售商百福控股有限公司（Pepkor Holdings Ltd.）计划将其之前在巴西每年开设 50 家分店的目标提高近一倍，以推动在南美的快速增长。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. plans to almost double its previous target of opening 50 outlets a year in Brazil as Africa’s largest clothing retailer pushes for faster growth in South America.】

item.title: 国债在债务拍卖高峰和通胀数据公布前保持稳定
item.description: 国债收益率小幅波动，两年期收益率维持在三周高位附近，因为投资者期待着一系列债务拍卖和美国通胀数据。【原文：Treasuries posted small moves, with the two-year yield staying near a three-week high, as investors looked ahead to a slate of debt auctions and US inflation data.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。周末假期过后，股市有望上涨，交易商准备迎接新的结算制度，苹果公司在中国继续反弹。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Stocks look set for gains after the holiday weekend, traders prepare for a new settlement regime and Apple continues its rebound in China. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 丰业银行盈利超出预期，资本市场和财富增长强劲
item.description: 丰业银行财富管理和资本市场业务发展势头良好，超出分析师预期。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia beat analysts’ estimates as it saw continued momentum in its wealth-management and capital-markets businesses.】

item.title: 监察机构称诺和诺德对丹麦就业的影响超乎想象
item.description: 据丹麦财政监督机构称，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）对丹麦就业水平的影响比先前估计的要大，这加剧了人们对北欧经济过于依赖这家制药巨头的担忧。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S has a greater impact on Denmark’s employment levels than previously estimated, according to the state’s fiscal watchdog, aggravating concerns the Nordic economy is becoming too dependent on the pharmaceutical giant.】

item.title: 新兴市场在大选成为中心舞台之前走低
item.description: 新兴市场资产周二温和走弱，因为投资者期待南非、墨西哥和印度未来几天的选举结果，以寻找新的交易机会。【原文：Emerging-market assets were mildly weaker on Tuesday as investors look to election results from South Africa, Mexico and India in the coming days for new trades.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购德国 PBB 10 亿美元抵押贷款组合
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 已从 Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG 购买了 10 亿美元的抵押贷款组合，因为这家德国房地产贷款机构正在努力应对商业房地产市场动荡的影响。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has bought a $1 billion mortgage portfolio from Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG as the German real estate lender grapples with the impact of volatile commercial real estate markets.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯利用债务市场出售三部分美元债券
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正寻求通过出售美元债券来筹集资金，以填补其财政缺口，并为王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的经济多元化计划提供资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia is looking to raise money through the sale of dollar-denominated sukuk as it seeks to plug a hole in its finances and fund spending on Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s economic diversification drive.】

item.title: 戈东瓦纳表示如果被要求将留任南非财政部长
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，他准备在大选后继续担任现职，并敦促南非投票支持非洲人国民大会，选择稳定而非 "混乱"。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said he is prepared to stay in his current role after the election and urged the country to choose stability over “chaos” by voting for the African National Congress.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称四月份消费者通胀预期下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，欧元区消费者的通胀预期在四月份有所下降；这进一步加强了下周开始降息的计划。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro zone edged lower in April, according to the European Central Bank — reinforcing plans to start lowering interest rates next week.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司考虑从突尼斯向欧洲出口氢气
item.description: 法国能源巨头道达尔能源 SE 和奥地利公用事业公司 Verbund AG 正在考虑在突尼斯生产绿色氢气，然后通过管道向欧洲出口这种零排放燃料。【原文：French energy giant TotalEnergies SE and Austrian utility Verbund AG are considering producing green hydrogen in Tunisia, before exporting the zero-emissions fuel by pipeline to Europe.】

item.title: 卡什卡利称美联储没有理由急于降息
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，政策制定者应慢慢监测通胀是否放缓到足以支持降息的程度。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said policymakers should take their time in monitoring whether inflation is slowing enough to warrant interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）6 月份对赞比亚的最新审查结果显示资金增加
item.description: 赞比亚预计将于下月结束与国际货币基金组织的第三次项目审查，届时这个铜矿丰富的国家将敲定 5 亿美元的国际援助，以应对创纪录的干旱造成的影响。【原文：Zambia expects to conclude its third program review with the International Monetary Fund next month, as the copper-rich nation finalizes $500 million of international assistance to deal with the effects of a record drought.】

item.title: 陷入困境的业主阿德勒因债务重组成本而蒙受损失
item.description: 德国房地产公司阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）第一季度亏损 8100 万欧元（8800 万美元），原因是该公司在与第二次重大债务重组相关的高额利息和咨询费用方面举步维艰。【原文：German real estate firm Adler Group SA posted a €81 million ($88 million) loss in the first quarter as it struggled with high interest and advisory costs linked to its second major debt overhaul.】

item.title: 股市崩盘打击回报率后，中国学者资产缩水
item.description: 自 2022 年末以来，中国量化对冲基金的资产在上一季度首次出现下降，此前中国股市崩盘打击了量化对冲基金的业绩，削弱了投资者对其算法驱动交易策略的信心。【原文：China’s quantitative hedge funds saw their assets drop last quarter for the first time since late 2022, after the nation’s stock-market meltdown hit performance and eroded investor confidence in their algorithm-driven trading strategies.】

item.title: 未来资产称印度或因消费时间减少而削减借贷
item.description: 未来资产印度投资管理公司（Mirae Asset Investment Managers India Pvt.【原文：India may cut its borrowings this year as the ongoing national elections narrow the government’s spending window by about three months, according to Mirae Asset Investment Managers India Pvt.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的贾达公司支持 2.5 亿美元的医疗保健基金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金的一个部门是 TVM Capital Healthcare 2.5 亿美元基金的投资者之一，该基金将专注于沙特阿拉伯的医疗保健行业。【原文：A unit of Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is among investors in TVM Capital Healthcare’s $250 million fund that will focus on the health-care industry in the kingdom.】
